alert.note: Alert for Custer; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 10:03PM CDT until July 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Loup County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Taylor, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taylor, Sargent, Comstock, Big Oak Canyon, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Divide Hill, Wescott and Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 114 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
